intro: Agathosma leipoldtii, commonly known as the Cape daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its showy yellow to orange flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments. It has aromatic leaves that are often used in traditional medicine. Agathosma leipoldtii is also valued for its ornamental appeal and is cultivated in gardens for its resilience and beauty.
